content: Reading this makes me happy. We NEED greater diversity in tech. Diversity of life experiences, diversity of minds, if we are going to be able to continue innovating in ways that help ALL people. Study hard, for sure, but don’t ever lose the sense of wonder that comes with simply PLAYING with technology. There are some horror stories about how women and People of Colour are treated. That wonder, and the play that comes with it should be your armor. Don’t let the bastards put you down. You got this.
